medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 days prior with abdominal pain and a cough. The mild diffuse abdominal pain worsened yesterday and migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) at 3:00 am. The patient also reported having chills and subjective fevers overnight, and experienced more than 24 hours of nonbilious, nonbloody emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Multiple sclerosis, left shoulder fracture, previous tummy tuck
